Ganna Androsova's journey into Data Science

Find out more

My Story

I am Ganna Androsova, PhD student in Bioinformatics. I started my journey as a Data Scientist during my Master, where I learned programming, researching and presenting results, and I then decided to bring it to the next level: PhD. I have always been motivated to make a difference to the world, which is why I chose the biomedical field and a practical AI application.

Step-by-step I have gained technical background (Python, R, Statistics, Machine Learning, etc.), which is a good start to becoming a Data Scientist. Wish me luck and follow my journey!

My Passions

Machine Learning

From simple models like regression or decision trees all the way up to the deep learning and neural networks.

Statistics

From assessing assumptions in inferential statistics to exploring priors in Bayesian statistics.

Research

From forming hypothesis to drawing informed conclusions leveraging data.

Data Science

From making data-driven decisions to predicting future outcomes.
